column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I also sigh at the unjustness of it all. So many Vietnamese places give a tasty broth
column7: way less than this place. Yeah
column9: but it's not apples to oranges either: they're satisfying bowls of steaming noodle soup. Is it cuz it's Japanese cuisine
column12: sleek...? Y u get mo money and fame 4 worse tasting noodle soup Jinya??
